getExportResourceImageFormat:

Gets the Node 's image format for a specific exported resource.

Parameters:
[in]rsrcId/ Node 's resource Id Valid values are : Unique valid value = EXPORT_TEXTURE
Returns:
: Image format used for the resource valid values are :
  • IMAGE_FORMAT_TGA
  • IMAGE_FORMAT_BMP
  • IMAGE_FORMAT_JPG
